text: Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.
author: Mark Twain

text: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.
author: Lewis B. Smedes

text: Forgiving is not forgetting, it's letting go of the hurt.
author: Mary McLeod Bethune

text: Forgiveness is the key to unlocking the door of resentment and the handcuffs of hatred.
author: Corrie Ten Boom

text: To err is human, to forgive, divine.
author: Alexander Pope

text: Forgiveness is the final form of love.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

text: Forgiveness is a gift you give yourself.
author: Tony Robbins

text: Forgiveness doesn't excuse their behavior. It prevents their behavior from destroying your heart.
author: unknown

text: Forgiveness is the path to freedom.
author: Byron Katie

text: When you forgive, you heal your own anger and hurt and are able to let love lead again.

text: Forgiveness is a decision, not an emotion.
author: Lysa TerKeurst

text: Forgiveness is giving up the hope that the past could have been any different.
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: Forgiveness is the healing balm that can soothe the most wounded of hearts.
author: unknown

text: Forgiveness is the final act of love.
author: Brad Johnson

text: Forgiveness is not a weakness, it's a strength. It takes a strong person to forgive.

author: Mark Twain

text: Forgiveness is a gift you give yourself.
author: Suzanne Somers

text: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.

text: The first to apologize is the bravest. The first to forgive is the strongest.
author: null

text: Forgive others, not because they deserve forgiveness, but because you deserve peace.
author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

text: Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.
author: Mark Twain

text: Forgiveness is the final form of love.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

text: Forgiveness is the key that unlocks the door of resentment and the handcuffs of hatred.
author: Corrie ten Boom

text: To be wronged is nothing unless you continue to remember it.

text: Forgiving is not forgetting. It's letting go of the hurt.
author: Mary McLeod Bethune

text: To forgive is the highest, most beautiful form of love. In return, you will receive untold peace and happiness.

text: Forgiveness does not change the past, but it does enlarge the future.

text: The practice of forgiveness is our most important contribution to the healing of the world.

text: Forgiveness is a funny thing. It warms the heart and cools the sting.

text: Forgiveness is a virtue of the brave.
author: Indira Gandhi

text: Forgiveness is the oil of relationships.
author: Josh McDowell

text: Forgiveness is the key to action and freedom.
author: Hannah Arendt

text: True forgiveness is when you can say, "Thank you for that experience."
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: Forgiveness is not always easy. At times, it feels more painful than the wound we suffered, to forgive the one that inflicted it. And yet, there is no peace without forgiveness.
author: Marianne Williamson

text: Forgiveness is the answer to the child's dream of a miracle by which what is broken is made whole again, what is soiled is again made clean.

text: Forgiveness is not an occasional act; it is a constant attitude.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

text: Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
author: null

text: Forgiveness is the act of admitting we are like other people.

text: The act of forgiveness takes place in our own mind. It really has nothing to do with the other person.
author: Louise Hay

text: To err is human; to forgive, divine.
author: Alexander Pope

text: Forgiveness liberates the soul. It removes fear. That is why it is such a powerful weapon.
author: Nelson Mandela

text: Forgiveness is not an emotion; it's a decision we make because we want to do what's right and be free of the emotional baggage.

text: Forgiveness is not always easy, but it is necessary.
